message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I was really hoping to get closer to the value I have in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think I've gone as low as I can. I'll offer it to you for $81. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
